website_summaries.verdict: An excellent quality cooler that keeps items cold and holds up well over time.
pros: Does a terrific job keeping food cold
cons: Heavy and somewhat hard to carry when full
The zipper may also be stiff upon initial use

customer_reviews.title: Best Lunch Box Yet!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality lunch box and I consider myself a coniseur of lunch boxes! Easily holds a mans sized 12 hour workday lunch... or like three lunches if you are just a normal human being. Great zippers, great pouch in the front, great click in/out shoulder strap, great carrying handles. The outter material is also top notch quality. I think it's nylon, but definitely heavy duty. Wasn't thrilled with the color of blue, almost looks lavender in some lights because of the grey accents. I should have gone with the all black or grey. Other than that this is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great large lunch bag if you like to carry more than just a small lunch.
customer_reviews.text: Super nice lunch bag. Bought for my hubby who loves all the compartments. Well insulated. Attractive (it's a grayish blue) Very well made. Strong zippers. Would be too large for me as I only take a standard lunch but he sometimes works 12 hour shifts and takes a few snacks with his lunch plus likes to carry around keys, a pager, some medication, lotion, some paperwork, etc. It's perfect for him. The only thing it should have that it doesn't is a cushioned shoulder strap as its heavy with all the stuff he carries around.
customer_reviews.author: LKT67

customer_reviews.title: Cooler that doesn't keep anything cool...
customer_reviews.text: Pros: -- Has tons of pockets, and places to isolate things you don't touching. -- Soft cooler, so it can be squeezed into smaller spaces. Cons: -- It doesn't keep things very cold -- The side pockets don't keep anything cold, more for utility purposes. Context: -- Tried many different cold pack inserts to try and keep things cool, but things just never stayed cool. -- Attempted to transport yogurt packs and garden vegetables, and the yogurt was a mess after a couple hours.
customer_reviews.author: WiseGuy

customer_reviews.title: So Glad I Found This
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic bag. I love it. It has plenty of room for the three quarts of water I haul to work plus my lunch. I still have not used all the pockets yet. The zippers are big and powerful and I don't worry about them breaking down some day. Very easy to clean. It is well insulated and my water stays cold, even the 3pm jug. The bag has gotten several compliments from co-workers who think its's stylist and professional looking.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Prohaska

customer_reviews.title: easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: It is hard to get excited about a lunch bag, but this bag has done it. It is well made, a bit large, easy to clean, well organized in terms of pockets and compartment sizes, accommodates my glass Rubbermaid containers and keeps my food relatively cold without adding an ice pack. Several other people have asked to check out my lunch and have purchased as a result. This is the kind of bag that will last years and years. Exceptionally pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: This seems like a very well build product
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a very well build product. I Like how its longer than my previous lunch bag/box so I can fit more to get me through the day. I work out and am going for bulk so I need alot of room for a high protein/calorie diet as well for my protein shakes. That being said I do wish you could zip the upper compartment open so you could increase the cool area. It needs to be just about an inch taller. Still great, been using it for a few weeks now and appears to be holding up to my overloading abuse.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1542

customer_reviews.title: Love , Love , Love
customer_reviews.text: I love my eBags Crew Cooler II in blue. It has all kinds of pouches and zippers. It is large enough for what I take with me but small enough to not be troublesome to drag along. I use the cooler section for drinks and the rest as sort of a purse. I take along my essentials (wallet, chap stick, water drops, Advil etc) and I don't have to carry a separate purse.
customer_reviews.author: Outspoken

customer_reviews.title: The winner
customer_reviews.text: If there is a better lunch cooler out there I cannot find it. My husband works with 15 other guys and he now has the best lunchbox of the station. I knew it would be good and now he does too. Finally something rugged enough to place in the back of the work truck on dry days and large enough for his big lunches. In fact, he has more roome than he actually needs!
customer_reviews.author: Hoofharted

customer_reviews.title: Like new after four years of daily use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over four years ago and take it to work daily. The zippers and other construction are still like new. It does not leak. My thermos fits nicely in the top section. I would "buy again" - if I ever have that need.
customer_reviews.author: sacto customer

customer_reviews.title: This bag is great if you need to pack a good amount of ...
customer_reviews.text: This bag is great if you need to pack a good amount of food/drink for the day. I can't speak to how well it keeps food cold, but it works just fine to get cold items from home to office in about an hour. My favorite feature of it is the two side pockets that hold thermoses. I bring two 40 oz, pretty bulky, thermoses with me every day, and this fits both and balances them nicely to make for easy carrying. Long strap makes it easy to throw over your shoulder and go.
customer_reviews.author: Raymonator

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Went to buy a replacement ebag to discover they are $20 more than the used to be .. great bag but i think its overpriced at this number i’ll try a different brand..
customer_reviews.author: TRAVIS LOPES

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have owned this bag for a little over 3 years now and it's great. I have over crammed this thing on an almost daily basis for the last 3+ years and none of the seams have come loose and the zippers still work perfectly. I also appreciate all the internal zipper compartments where I can separate my pills and other necessities. It's a very nice heavy duty bag.
customer_reviews.author: vanhip

customer_reviews.title: Serves the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for my purpose. I use it to hold a jar of milk, cream or yogurt and keep it cool before I can get these products home to the refrigerator so that they don't spoil. It is good at least for a couple of hours. One can put reusable ice-cubes in it and it would keep these cool for much longer, I am sure.
customer_reviews.author: Lightofjoy

customer_reviews.title: Great size and it is holding up to a lot ...
customer_reviews.text: Great size and it is holding up to a lot of use. It's been about a year and a half since we got ours and everything still is in good condition. It gets carried to and from work 5 days a week, with room for some ice packs, plenty of food, and even your beverages. We pack large salads often, and regular sized lunch bags are not big enough for a wide, flat container like we use. This was a good purchase for us.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: Best lunch box I have ever owned!!!! Totally worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best and toughest lunch bag I have ever owned. It is very easy to carry and fits way more than you need. I use the top pocket to carry my Bible and other snacks in and it fits perfectly. Also, the canvas like material is very, very durable so if you are rough on lunch bags like I am, this is what you need!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Love all the extra pockets
customer_reviews.text: This is the right size for me. Love all the extra pockets. Just two issues, the zipper to the big storage. I have to hold the front corners to pull both zippers to the back to open or close. It feels like it catches but with a little tug and straightening of the front corners they zip. I carry a small flashlight, supplements and maybe a banana in the top storage compartment and I have the issue of top heavy, I place the bag on a table and it leans forward likes it's going to fall. No big deal I am still satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Without a doubt the best lunch bag ever
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of my favorite Amazon purchases ever. Holds enough food for when I have to work 24 hours straight. Plenty of storage without bulkiness. I'd rate it ten stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: KFett

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a small cooler bag for family of four ...
customer_reviews.text: perfect for a small cooler bag for family of four for drinks, yogurts, ice blocks, some fruit. Any bigger and it wouldn't be ideal for carrying on shoulder. Perfect for out family trip this summer. We packed it every morning after breakfast and the waters, fruit, and yogurts stayed cold for hours through lunch time, held us just right until dinner:-)
customer_reviews.author: Anne Strasser

customer_reviews.title: Good size
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Fits a 13x9 with a little push. Zipper is the only negative. Does not slide easily.
customer_reviews.author: Christal

customer_reviews.title: Great bag size
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this for my son and daughter in law, but when I asked to borrow it... They couldn't part since it was an every day lunch box. Now I know why they couldn't part with it. Great bag size, keep stuff cold or hot. Would purchase again as a gift.,
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler/lunch bag. Just the right size to carry lunch snacks drinks and the odds and ends you might need during the day. Lots of pockets for keepng things organized. It is only fair at keeping things cool, but the removable liner makes it simple to add some reflectix behind it which nealy doubles the effectiveness for about a dollars worth of material. Too new to speak to the durability, but it looks to be well constructed
customer_reviews.author: quietmike

customer_reviews.title: Bar none the Best!!!
customer_reviews.text: Have used this cooler almost every day for a year now and it is the BEST soft side cooler I have ever purchased!!! I have purchased many less expensive coolers and this one is well worth the money. Not one failure of any sort in a year and I treat it pretty roughly. I think I will get several years out of this cooler!!! With four small 99 cent ice blocks it keeps food cold up to 18 hours!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sherrie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooler
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean, easy to travel with (our family of 5 always travels with food, and the strap in the back makes it very easy to carry by attaching to a rolling luggage or a larger cooler which we take on road trips. It is versatile and has a lot of compartments. If you use it only for food, though, I would opt for a larger main compartment at the expense of a the extra top compartment.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: The only thing this bag needs is a little more insulation. There are plenty of seperate compartments to store different items. Top pouch is great for medicane, silverware and the little extra things you may need through the day. Large compartment holds plenty of stuff and will hold larger dishes as it is so flexible. Have owned it for several months now and it appears to be very well made. Inside liner zips out for easy cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: M. Pierce

customer_reviews.title: eBags Crew Cooler II
customer_reviews.text: This bag served me very well. It has all the compartments you want, and the main storage is very large. Functional is an understatement. Very strurdy and the carry strap is a plus. Highly recommend it for packing a lunch, or even a utility bag for your phone, tablet, power plugs, etc. while heading out on a trip or an overnighter.
customer_reviews.author: Scot H.

customer_reviews.title: would have been fine. Though I can now take along extra drinks
customer_reviews.text: This thing is enormous! The jr. would have been fine.Though I can now take along extra drinks, which is never a bad thing. The Rubbermaid lunch sets work very well in conjunction with this bag!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The bag is a bit big!
customer_reviews.text: I like the bag but it is a bit big for one person. It measures 13" x 9" and 10 tall.
customer_reviews.author: T hayden

customer_reviews.title: just right
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is a union electrician. He works 10 hr days and carries lunch and snacks and coffee and water. I usually get his lunch boxes in the camping section of a local store. He likes this a lot. The side pockets open up to carry his coffee travel mug on one side and his 1cup thermos in the other pocket. This heavy duty bag has room for everything.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary Quite Contrary

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy construction, great design
customer_reviews.text: Truly a tough bag and it has room for everything! When you first receive it, it may feel like it's a little too big, but once you discover that you can actually take everything you need in one bag you won't look back.
customer_reviews.author: ClearlyPilfered

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great! It has many clever pockets and compartments to organize things besides food items that need to be on ice. I take this all the time in the car for roadtrips with kids. It also works great for picnics, days at the beach etc. You won't be disappointed, I use this cooler all the time.
customer_reviews.author: upnorthgirl

customer_reviews.title: How to get replaceable PVC-free PEVA liner
customer_reviews.text: Just found out that the liner is not available or for sale anywhere. If your liner ever goes bad (rips, zipper goes bad etc.) then simply call the eBags company at 1-800-820-6126 and they'll send out another as part of their warranty absolutely free.
customer_reviews.author: USSR

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag after trying the Jr version. The Jr version was too small for what I needed. This one is bigger and holds alot of stuff. I use it for my lunch at work. Would like to have seen one made maybe between the Jr size and this size. Just what I needed for a 32oz Gatorade bottle and other items in the main compartment. Very good quality and would purchase again
customer_reviews.author: M. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: The quality and construction of the bag is really good.
customer_reviews.text: It's bigger than it looks. Wife bought this as a lunch bag, but it can probably hold a twelve pack of cans. Still great for my lunch. The quality and construction of the bag is really good.
customer_reviews.author: Bas875

customer_reviews.title: great for travel and local events
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag. I got it because I travel a lot and find out cheaper and easier to bring my own food. My husband and I went on a boat trip recently and a summer picnic and used this bag for both. It was large enough for everything and the top keeps your dry food separate and prevents it from getting soggy. The zip out pocket on the side for drinks is the best!
customer_reviews.author: addicted to amazon!

customer_reviews.title: great gift for them and you!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for the men in my life for Christmas gifts,One to take to sport events ,the other will take on business trip flights to have decent ,healthy food on flights since the airlines no longer provide.They were both thrilled with the gift and can hardly wait to use it.Now I'm thinking' ,"hey I want one too!"
customer_reviews.author: Marion H.

customer_reviews.title: It is good quality
customer_reviews.text: I like the material and it looks like it is durable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big but AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler. It is a bit larger than what I needed but I can keep 2 camelbaks inside and a few Tupperware pieces on top of them on the inside of the main cooler. I keep an extra phone charger and random stuff in the pocket on the top. I can even put my coffee mug in the side pocket and have one hand free to unlock the car in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Glass

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best lunch bag I have ever owned. I can't fill it. I take a lot of good with me for the day and there is nothing that they bad boy can't handle. Great construction very durable too.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Arkin

customer_reviews.title: Excellent !!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent lunch bag. I glued the sleeve and made it a pocket. Use a hot glue gun or upholstery glue.
customer_reviews.author: Movie Guy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my lunch and drinks cool on a hot day! Love that it has a seperate compartment for extra stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Jaycee

customer_reviews.title: Good, but a little narrow
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good, very nice bag. I can lay down 2 water bottles and a soda fits perpendicular at the end. It is a little narrower than my previous bags though, I can only get 2 water bottles width wise, I would prefer 3. Not a deal killer though. It had good reviews and I am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second bag I have purchased - use the first one so much I decided I needed a second. The original is several years old now and still looks pristine. Very sturdy bags!
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: Had this bag for a 10 months now and still use it everyday at work
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag and WOW..Plenty of room,lots of storage...I am a truck driver and keep my standard size thermos and coffee cup in it a few sandwich and my personals...in the top portion i keep my over the head blue parrot head set along with my GPS and head flashlight...this bag has plenty of inside and side storage also....I LIKE IT
customer_reviews.author: Chuckk Buckk

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler. I use it every day
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooler. I use it every day. The design is very intelligent with several zipper pockets and a waterproof liner that is removable for cleaning. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Wish it was a little bigger
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes his new lunch bag, but some of his larger water bottles don’t fit.
customer_reviews.author: JessLV

customer_reviews.title: Well made and handy!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Plenty of room for a picnic or a day trip.
customer_reviews.author: Armstrang

customer_reviews.title: Convenient Insulated Tote
customer_reviews.text: My husband's daily lunch pail and it's always ready for a quick outing for two.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M Swanson

customer_reviews.title: Great Lunch Bag
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived as advertised. I use the bag for lunch. It is a great size especially if you are going to have a long day, you can pack two meals in the bag. I like the cold section and warm section. Did by ice packs to keep food cold. It seems to keep food cold for 6 - 8 hours with two ice packs.
customer_reviews.author: GWS

customer_reviews.title: This is a great bag, Well built with good zippers should last ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bag, Well built with good zippers should last a long time. My only complaint is it's width is a bit too thin for a frozen dinner sit flat so it has to be angled. Plenty of extra length though.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Williams

customer_reviews.title: Husband uses it for work and he seems to like it. We have yet to test the warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband uses it for work and he seems to like it. We have yet to test the warm summer heat in a factory but so far so good. He likes the blue color as well. It holds a lot and that's always good too!
customer_reviews.author: zaysmom

customer_reviews.title: I like it..
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once yet but from first useage I can tell its a durable product and I will love using it. The only thing I wish it had was some type of velcro strap to secure the 2 handles together on the top.. Excellent product I like it..
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: The best personal cooler I have ever used!
customer_reviews.text: The best carry along cooler I have ever used. Very durable and well designed. Keeps your stuff cool and dry in wet weather. Straps are very well designed and zippers are heavy duty. Liner is easy to clean. What else do you need?
customer_reviews.author: D R Ulmer

customer_reviews.title: Army strong lunch box
customer_reviews.text: I searched online for days to find THE perfect cooler to send with my husband to work. His days can run from 5 am to 7pm if not longer. I needed a professional looking, tough enough for the range, easy to carry all black cooler. This thing is perfect!!! Roomy without it looking ridiculous, and like your carrying a picnic basket. The top compartment I fill with nuts, energy bars, etc. He loves it. It wipes out beautifully and keeps food cold all day. A true heavy duty man lunch box, that any woman would love as well.
customer_reviews.author: mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: Best lunch bag of ALL TIME
customer_reviews.text: This bag wins the award for best lunch bad of all time! Seriously! Its sturdy, lots of room, lots of interior pockets, and it looks good too. I chose it over literally hundreds of bags.
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: I purchase this about a year ago and it's been ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this about a year ago and it's been in the rain,mud, sun etc , i work in the construction industry and i can tell u that this bag is very well made.
customer_reviews.author: J LEON

customer_reviews.title: eBag Changes
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Cooler II. This recent model came with different zippers (look less quality). time will determine if true. The Bag strap had a clip sewn in the wrong way which called for twisting the strap to make it work. I had to call eBags to get a new strap. The reason I bought a new bag is because the "black" handle portion started tearing on my last bag. I got about 3 years use out of the last one.
customer_reviews.author: battwo1

customer_reviews.title: The best of the best
customer_reviews.text: If you hate quality, and good looks, then this is not the cooler/lunch bag for you.. The zipper molds to your finger and thumb in a brushed satin finish... The Heavy canvas in this awesome color will last for yrs. You should prob be good looking, or famous,Or an Airline Pilot, or rich to use this bag, because you will get noticed. If your not, .... <just lie>
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent lunch bag! Room for everything! Get lots of compliments on it!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cooler/lunch box!!
customer_reviews.text: This is the lunch box that I've been looking for! It's big enough that I fit a full sized Nalgene water bottle along with an actual lunch in standard size tupperware containers. The only negative is that the shoulder strap does not have a cushion pad so it can dig into your shoulder if you have anything heavy. I fixed though through ordering one off Ebay for a few bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Neff

customer_reviews.title: The bag is great! Well constructed
customer_reviews.text: The bag is great! Well constructed, pleasant color and makes for great organization. I really like it. I would certainly tell anyone about it that is looking for a great insulated bag.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Phares

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lunch bag
customer_reviews.text: Awesome lunch bag ! Sits right on top of my roller bag luggage and can hold all my food items.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Nice color and seems to be solid quality
customer_reviews.text: A bit smaller than what I wanted for storing food on car trips or family picnics but it will probably do. Nice color and seems to be solid quality.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Holds everything I need for a 12 hour day at work. Everything I want to stay dry, I just put in the top storage compartment and all of the cold items go in the cooler portion.
customer_reviews.author: stephen patterson

customer_reviews.title: it's perfect. When I'm bring both breakfast and lunch to ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a big lunch bag so if that's what you are looking for, it's perfect. When I'm bring both breakfast and lunch to work, it's perfect. It will also make for a great beach / picnic bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jelewis

customer_reviews.title: ebag crew cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. I use it for taking my lunch to work. Its built good and the top pocket is great for keeping my bookreader in. The only thing i don't like about it is that it doesn't have the extra padding on the strap but it's still pretty comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Rugged high quality bag.
customer_reviews.text: I have found the eBag Crew Cooler ll to be of very good quality, and keeps my lunch and snack items cool. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: eBags Crew Cooler 11 was perfect for my husband.
customer_reviews.text: I got this bag for my husband as one of his Xmas presents. It was just what he wanted. The size was perfect for him and there were a lot of pockets to put the things in that he needs. He does not need it to hold a lunch or such, so I can't comment on that feature.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Lanz Jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Great soft cooler
customer_reviews.text: ebags......what more do i need to say? If you aren't familiar with their products then you are missing out on great affordable items.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Mcpherson

customer_reviews.title: Best daily lunch carrier bag
customer_reviews.text: This is the best lunch carrier to buy. It is a little more expensive than a wal-mart or other lunch bags but you get so much more. The zippers and compartments are well thought out and work well. I can usually fit a breakfast container and lunch container at the same time. This is a well constructed bag with heavy fabric and zippers.
customer_reviews.author: D. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Zipper to insulated section not fully sewn on bag
customer_reviews.text: This just arrived and the stitching between the zipper & the insulated part of the bag is open (see upper right of photo). Hopefully I can try a replacement at the original price (price is now higher than what it was when I purchased it.)
customer_reviews.author: Delighted

customer_reviews.title: A++++
customer_reviews.text: If you are a cop, firefighter, EMT, etc who takes their lunch to work..... this is perfect for you. Tough as nails and has all the right pockets in all the right places.
customer_reviews.author: Boda

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: We love it been using it for 2 years now with no issues, I highly recommend t
customer_reviews.author: lkabbara

customer_reviews.title: but has amazing capacity. I'm very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: Holds way more food than I expected. The size isnt too big, but has amazing capacity. I'm very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dana J. Roberson

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice bag. It is more of a rectangular shape ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bag. It is more of a rectangular shape so make sure your containers are the same shape; otherwise, its nice.
customer_reviews.author: DAL

customer_reviews.title: Food hauler.
customer_reviews.text: Best lunchbox I've ever had. Fits a shifts worth of caffeine, food, a few snacks, and even some tea bags and other improvised beverage situation management options.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Wiles

customer_reviews.title: It pays for itself in the long run!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, just took it on a road trip! It saved me alot of money. Kept some ice packs in main compartment with some fruit, milk, and jars of pb&j. Also had some bread and crackers in the top compartment, and a plastic spork and napkins in the front compartment. That and my Nalgene water bottle and I was set! Can't say enough good. It's worth the investment, as it pays for itself in the long run!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: "Manly yes, but I like it too"
customer_reviews.text: Sharp looking and extra roomy. Bought as Christmas gift for hubby and he loves it. I looked around for something that did not look girly and was large enough for a whole day's worth of food (and sometimes overtime). This is the best of what I found. I use glass containers for his food and they fit nicely. It would also be useful for any weekend road trip.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooler. I saw the ones carried by the ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cooler. I saw the ones carried by the airline pilots and thought we'd give it a try. We took it on our last trip and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: PMRF - Westside

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Great lunch Bag! Co-worker had one and fell in love with it. I received mine and totally love it!
customer_reviews.author: TLO619

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this bag; very versatile.
customer_reviews.text: I use this bag everyday. It is a very good size, has lots of pockets, washable, and very versatile. I am very pleased with my purchase. A friend saw mine and bought one, too.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect! Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend for his birthday. He's gotten several compliments on the size of the cooler for lunches. It's perfect! Really good quality, tons of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Chanda Hall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the bag, have a few friends that recommend it and they were right. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: JW

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: I like this bag very much, the quality of the materials are of good quality and durable. Even though the price is on the high side compared to other bags in the stores, I think is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Bag
customer_reviews.text: Although the bag is a little larger than I was expecting it appears to be a neat little bag. I wanted something a bit smaller to carry lunch in but I guess it will have to do.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Tee

customer_reviews.title: eBags are the Best
customer_reviews.text: I am an attorney and I needed a lunch bag which looked professional and was very practical. EBags are without a doubt the very best. They look great. They look professional, and they can carry my lunch, my keys, wallet, cell phone, and miscellaneous. Very durable, fantastic looking, and just an outstanding product. The jury is in, and you win without a doubt. Thank you for such an amazing product.
customer_reviews.author: RJE

customer_reviews.title: Very usefull
customer_reviews.text: I like it very much. My wish for a better version of this bag would be that it had more dry storage, maybe less cold storage, better build quality, and some caribiner attachments
customer_reviews.author: John Blair

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it. It has a lot of space
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tote Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Well designed. Compact with lots of options. A great short trip or beach cooler.
customer_reviews.author: JA Lowcountry

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for carrying on snacks etc. on the plane and just to have in the car for last minute frozen grocery items. Very convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice lunch box. My hubby loves it. Good made. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a sturdy lunch bag with a second compartment on top to keep my personal effects in. This bag met all my expectations and keeps the food surprisingly cold when I throw in an ice pack. The additional side pouches make this a perfect utility/lunch bag for the working man. It is large enough to pack a good sized lunch.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Werner

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for daily travel.
customer_reviews.text: My mom loves it. She carries water bottles and travels all day in her car. She loves all the pockets too. This is the best bag and its very well made.
customer_reviews.author: MTP Purchases

customer_reviews.title: Best bag ever!
customer_reviews.text: We have purchased numerous bags thru the years for my husband lunches. He drives truck. He does not have time to stop and eat so he needs 12 hours worth of food and drinks. Plenty of storage and it is made very well. Often he has come home and said how thankful he is for this cooler.
customer_reviews.author: Joyful Mother

customer_reviews.title: ... and how my old on came apart--I would highly recommend this lunch
customer_reviews.text: I just got this bag for xmas-- but based on what I had and how my old on came apart--I would highly recommend this lunch bag
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Draper

customer_reviews.title: Bag for everything
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved this bag it not only held food but everything else she carries.
customer_reviews.author: aknurse

customer_reviews.title: Very good cooler
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for my need! Works well does not hold ice as long as I had hoped but, Much Better than the average!
customer_reviews.author: RK

customer_reviews.title: Best I've gotten!
customer_reviews.text: I love it! It's the perfect size for me to use at work. Solid construction, feels like it's gonna last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: Use this every day for lunch, and damn it ...
customer_reviews.text: Use this every day for lunch, and damn it takes some punishment! I will warn you though, its gigantic.
customer_reviews.author: Brian B.

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bag for a pilot
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Super sturdy and has lots of room for longer flights.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice bag, but way too big for a lunch ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a very nice bag, but way too big for a lunch pail. I hope I can find a smaller one similar tothis.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie A. McCormack

product_meta.title: eBags Crew Cooler II Soft Sided Insulated Lunch Box - For Work, Travel & Weekends - (Blue Yonder)
